questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'By the time you arrive, I _______ (finish) my work.'
Spot the mistake: 'She will be working at the cafe next week.'
Fill in the blank: 'I think it _______ (rain) tomorrow.'
Spot the mistake: 'They won't be attend the meeting.'
Fill in the blank: 'At this time tomorrow, they _______ (travel) to London.'
Spot the mistake: 'By next year, she will graduated from college.'
Fill in the blank: 'Unless you hurry, the tickets _______ (sell) out.'
Spot the mistake: 'I am sure he will be love the surprise.'
Fill in the blank: 'They _______ (not be) here by 5pm.'
Spot the mistake: 'By the time she arrives, the movie will started.'
